item.description: An arrest warrant has been issued for WBA lightweight champion Gervonta “Tank” Davis in connection with an alleged domestic violence incident dating back to October.

item.title: NFF Announces All-Star 2026 College Football Hall of Fame Class - National Football Foundation
item.description: IRVING, Texas (Jan. 14, 2026)– The National Football Foundation (NFF) & College Hall of Fame announced today the 2026 College Football Hall of Fame Class during “College Football Live Presented by Great Clips” on ESPN2.

item.title: Here are each team's first workout dates of Spring Training 2026 - MLB.com
item.description: Following are the first workout dates, subject to change, for pitchers and catchers as well as full squads of the 30 Major League clubs for 2026 Spring Training.

item.title: Virginia Tech, JMU cancel 2026 football game - Virginia Tech Athletics
item.description: None

item.title: Devils' performance 'absolutely not good enough,' GM Fitzgerald says - NHL.com
item.description: Shoulders blame for 6th-place standing in Metro, believes in core, coaching staff, playoff hopes
